channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire deal tested. And, Supreme Court hears case questioning voting rights
item.description: Israel pressures Hamas to hand over hostage bodies more quickly, testing the ceasefire deal. And, the Supreme Court takes up a major case on that coul...

item.title: A Supreme Court ruling on voting rights could boost Republicans' redistricting efforts
item.description: A Supreme Court case over Louisiana's congressional map could determine the future of Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination and ...

item.title: Study: We're losing the war against drug-resistant infections faster than we thought
item.description: Antimicrobial resistance is responsible for some 1.2 million deaths a year a year and contributes to millions more. Data in the new report shows that ...

item.title: Greetings from the Rhône Glacier, where a gash of pink highlights how it's melting
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Raila Odinga, Kenya's former Prime Minister, dies at 80
item.description: Raila Odinga — the towering figure of Kenyan politics who helped usher in multiparty democracy and a new constitution — has died in India at 80.

item.title: ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for verified adults, says OpenAI boss
item.description: CEO Sam Altman says upcoming versions of the popular chatbot would enable it to behave in a more human-like way - "but only if you want it".

item.title: The government shutdown is putting a renewed spotlight on the cracks in the US aviation system
'Father of our democracy': Kenya's Raila Odinga dies in India aged 80
item.description: President Ruto leads the tributes to Kenya's former prime minister and long-time opposition leader.

item.title: 'He transformed R&B forever' - Stars pay tribute to D’Angelo, after his death at 51
item.description: The Grammy-winning singer, who died of cancer, "transformed R&B forever", says Beyoncé.

item.title: Listen Live: Supreme Court weighs challenge to Louisiana congressional map
item.description: The Supreme Court is considering whether Louisiana's intentional creation of a second majority-Black district violates the 14th and 15th Amendments.

item.title: Hostage families confirm identities of three of four bodies handed over by Hamas
item.description: Hamas has yet to return 21 hostages' bodies as agreed under a ceasefire deal brokered by the US.

item.title: Tim Meadows brings workplace comedy to the DMV in new series
item.description: Comedian Tim Meadows stars as Gregg, a former English teacher who became a DMV examiner, in the new CBS comedy "DMV." The series follows Gregg and his...

item.title: Watch: Freed detainee finds family alive after thinking they had been killed
item.description: Shadi Abu Sido told the BBC an Israeli prison officer said his family had been killed.

item.title: Some protein powders and shakes contain high lead levels, Consumer Reports finds
item.description: Consumer Reports says it tested 23 brands of protein powders and ready-to-drink shakes, finding that about 70% of the products it tested contained mor...

item.title: Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
item.description: Officials in Alaska are rushing to find housing for people from tiny coastal villages devastated by the remnants of Typhoon Halong.

item.title: Sweden to set up emergency grain reserves to be prepared for crisis
item.description: Sweden will set up its first emergency grain stocks in the north of the country, a region that risks being isolated in a conflict, the government said...

item.title: Trump officials back firm in fight over California offshore oil drilling after huge spill
Senate prepares for 9th vote to fund government on Day 15 of shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown enters its third week as the Senate plans its ninth vote on a House-passed measure to fund the government. Follow live updates...
